metadata.title: Roscoe Medical HW-NAVY CPAP Hose Cover - Prevents Water Condensation In CPAP Hoses, For 6 Foot CPAP Hoses, Navy Blue
features: CPAP hose cover that is made of ultra soft fleece material. CPAP tubing hose cover prevents rainout(water condensation in the CPAP hose).
CPAP cover fits over any 6-foot CPAP tube
CPAP cover has velcro closures at the end to prevent CPAP wrap from sliding off the CPAP hose.
Multiple colors are available in the hose wrap. Hose cover is made of soft fleece material.
Trust Roscoe, a leader in sleep therapy and provider of CPAP equipment, including CPAP tube covers.
description: The CPAP Hose Wrap from Roscoe Medical fits over any 6-foot CPAP tube and features Velcro closures preventing the wrap from sliding off. The hose wrap also features an ultra soft fleece material available in five different colors.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "9.84 x 3.7 x 2.28 inches; 3.84 Ounces", "Item model number": "HW-NAVY", "Date First Available": "May 27, 2015", "Manufacturer": "Roscoe Medical, Inc.", "Country of Origin": "China"}
